title: Girl, 17, vanishes overnight after going for a walk with her dog in Gracemeare
text:
A 17-year-old girl has vanished overnight after going for a walk with her dog in central Queensland.

She was last seen near Anna Meares Avenue in Gracemeare, Rockhampton, at 4.30pm on Wednesday.

The teenager has a mental condition and could have gone off with a stranger because she is 'very trusting', police say.

A 17-year-old girl (pictured) has vanished overnight after going for a walk with her dog

Her dog was found alone at 9.30pm.

The Aboriginal girl is described as approximately 160cm tall, with a proportionate build, fair skin, brown shoulder length hair and brown eyes.

She was last seen wearing a black shirt with white writing on the front, dark blue denim shorts and black joggers.

Police are urgently pleading for the assistance of the public to help find the girl.

Anyone with information is urged to call crime stoppers on 1800 333 000.
description: She was last seen near Anna Meares Avenue in Gracemeare, Rockhampton, at 4.30pm on Wednesday.
authors: Paula Ahillon For Daily Mail Australia
